clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesnâ€™t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.

clauses.title: You can delete your account and Duck Addresses
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.

clauses.title: This service provides an onion site accessible over Tor
clauses.description: Tor is a software for anonymous communication that directs Internet traffic through an overlay network. Onion sites are only available through Tor browser and provide additional security and anonymity to users.

clauses.title: The service makes critical changes to its terms without user involvement
clauses.description: They may significantly update the terms at any time and at their sole discretion, meaning for any reason and without necessarily taking into account the interests or suggestions of the users of the Service.
